text.div:
TumourStageT

A code that records tumour stage T

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tumour-stage-t, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
tx TX Primary tumour cannot be assessed
t0 T0 No evidence of primary tumour
tis Tis Carcinoma in situ: intraepithelial or invasion of lamina propria
t1 T1 Tumour invades submucosa
t2 T2 Tumour invades muscularis propria
t3 T3 Tumour invades through the muscularis propria into pericolorectal tissues
t4a T4a Tumour penetrates to the surface of the visceral peritoneum
t4b T4b Tumour directly invades or is adherent to other organs or structures

name: TumourStageT
